title: IBM, Rivian, AMD, Tesla: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Chip makers shares were rising; China’s car market snapped a three-year decline last year, helped by strong electric vehicle sales
body:
Stock futures are inching higher ahead of testimony from Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell that could offer clues about future rate increases. Here’s what we’re watching Tuesday:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
